Package game.movement

Class EvadeDinoBehaviour

java.lang.Object
game.movement.EvadeDinoBehaviour
All Implemented Interfaces:
Behaviour
public class EvadeDinoBehaviour
extends java.lang.Object
implements Behaviour
Simulates behaviour of DinoActor fleeing from other DinoActors.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    EvadeDinoBehaviour()
    Constructor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Action getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns a DynamicMoveAction for the Pterodactyl to flee from the other DinoActors if the Pterodactyl landed on a corpse and there are other DinoActors around, returns null otherwise.
    private boolean landedOnCorpse​(Location location)
    Returns true if there is a Corpse on the location, false otherwise.
    private boolean surroundedByDino​(Location location, GameMap map, Actor actor)
    Returns true if the location does not have any DinoActors around it, apart from the Actor that is trying to flee itself, returns false otherwise.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • EvadeDinoBehaviour

      public EvadeDinoBehaviour()
      Constructor.

  • Method Details

    • getAction

      public Action getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns a DynamicMoveAction for the Pterodactyl to flee from the other DinoActors if the Pterodactyl landed on a corpse and there are other DinoActors around, returns null otherwise.
      Specified by:
      getAction in interface Behaviour
      Parameters:
      actor - the Actor acting
      map - the GameMap containing the Actor
      Returns:
      DynamicMoveAction if the actor should flee, null otherwise
      See Also:
      Actor.playTurn(Actions, Action, GameMap, Display)

    • landedOnCorpse

      private boolean landedOnCorpse​(Location location)
      Returns true if there is a Corpse on the location, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      location - a Location
      Returns:
      true if there is a Corpse on the location, false otherwise.

    • surroundedByDino

      private boolean surroundedByDino​(Location location, GameMap map, Actor actor)
      Returns true if the location does not have any DinoActors around it, apart from the Actor that is trying to flee itself, returns false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      location - a Location
      map - map that the DinoActor is on
      actor - An Actor that is trying to flee from other DinoActors
      Returns:
      true if the location does not have any DinoActors (that is not the actor) around it, false otherwise.
